Tavatron:

Tavatron growled in annoyance, she knew something was wrong, and she didn't 
appreciate the fact that Dinobot wouldn't tell her. She knew he had his 
reasons, but whatever the reason it was not worth it. It was obvious he was 
in pain, 'bots don't just cough up mech-fluid for the hell of it.

Tavatron took a deep breath and calmed herself. She wasn't angry, just 
concerned. She crouched beside Dinobot, though he had said he was alright 
she knew better. She'd seen too many battles not to know when a 'bot was in 
pain:

"We have to get you to an 'R chamber, now." Tavatron gave Dinobot a look 
that basically said 'if you say no I'll drag you there myself'. She wasn't 
going to let him continue to battle in this state.

Tavatron's head snapped up when she saw the weapon's fire coming toward the 
ark:

"Oh slag..." Tavatron opened a channel to Iron Raptor:

"Commander, we are under heavy fire. I repeat, we are under attack." 
Tavatron closed the channel and returned her attention to Dinobot. There was 
no way they could get inside the ark without getting blown to pieces.

Tavatron sighed inwardly, under normal circumstances she would leave Dinobot 
where he was and attack the intruders, but she couldn't, something was 
stopping her. It was feeling, she just couldn't leave him, it wouldn't be... 
honorable:

"We have to get to shelter. The attackers are heavily armed. We would be at 
a serious disadvantage if we remained in the open."
